daily.summary: Mixed precipitation throughout the week, with temperatures rising to 6°C on Tuesday.

alerts.title: Blizzard Watch for Hudson, NJ
alerts.description:
...NOREASTER TO IMPACT THE TRI-STATE AREA THIS WEEKEND...
...BLIZZARD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH
SUNDAY AFTERNOON...
* LOCATIONS...THE FIVE BOROUGHS OF NEW YORK CITY...COASTAL
PORTIONS OF NORTHEAST NEW JERSEY...AND LONG ISLAND.
* HAZARD TYPES...HEAVY SNOW ALONG WITH STRONG AND POTENTIALLY
DAMAGING WINDS.
* ACCUMULATIONS...SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 6 TO 10 INCHES.
* WINDS...NORTHEAST 20 TO 30 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 50 MPH.
ISOLATED GUSTS TO 60 MPH ARE POSSIBLE NEAR THE IMMEDIATE COAST.
* TEMPERATURES...IN THE UPPER 20S.
* VISIBILITIES...ONE QUARTER MILE OR LESS AT TIMES.
* TIMING...SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON.
* IMPACTS...EXTREMELY DANGEROUS TRAVEL DUE TO HEAVY SNOWFALL AND
STRONG WINDS WITH WHITEOUT CONDITIONS LIKELY. SECONDARY AND
TERTIARY ROADS MAY BECOME IMPASSABLE. STRONG WINDS MAY DOWN
POWER LINES AND TREE LIMBS.

alerts.title: Coastal Flood Watch for Hudson, NJ
alerts.description:
...POTENTIAL FOR WIDESPREAD MODERATE COASTAL FLOODING SATURDAY
EVENING....
...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT SATURDAY EVENING...
* LOCATIONS...COASTAL LOCATIONS ADJACENT TO THE SOUTH SHORE OF
WESTERN AND CENTRAL LONG ISLAND AND NEW YORK HARBOR.
* TIDAL DEPARTURES...3 TO 4 FEET ABOVE NORMAL ASTRONOMICAL TIDES.
* BEACH EROSION...LARGE BREAKING WAVES ON THE SHORE OF LONG
ISLAND MAY RESULT IN EROSION OF DUNES AND LOCALIZED OVERWASH
FOR THE BARRIER BEACHES FROM FIRE ISLAND AND POINTS WEST.
* TIMING...DURING THE SATURDAY EVENING HIGH TIDE CYCLE.
* IMPACTS...MODERATE TO LOCALIZED MAJOR COASTAL FLOODING.
WIDESPREAD FLOODING OF VULNERABLE SHORE ROADS AND/OR
BASEMENTS. LIVES MAY BE AT RISK FOR PEOPLE WHO PUT THEMSELVES
IN HARM/S WAY. ISOLATED STRUCTURAL DAMAGE MAY BE OBSERVED. A
COASTAL FLOOD WARNING MAY BE NEEDED.
...SOUTH SHORE BAYS WATER LEVELS FOR SATURDAY EVENING...
COASTAL............TIME OF......FORECAST TOTAL........FLOOD....
LOCATION...........HIGH TIDE.....WATER LEVEL..........CATEGORY.
...................................(MLLW/NGVD).................
FREEPORT GAUGE NY.....805 PM.....6.5-7.1/5.7-6.3......MAJOR....
POINT LOOKOUT NY......708 PM.....6.9-7.5/.............MODERATE.
JAMAICA BAY NY........807 PM.....8.7-9.3/.............MODERATE.
ROCKAWAY INLET NY.....727 PM.....8.3-8.9/.............MODERATE.
E ROCKAWAY NY.........721 PM.....7.3-7.9/.............MODERATE.
LINDENHURST NY........948 PM.....4.0-4.6/.............MAJOR....
...NY HARBOR WATER LEVELS FOR SATURDAY EVENING...
COASTAL............TIME OF......FORECAST TOTAL........FLOOD....
LOCATION...........HIGH TIDE.....WATER LEVEL..........CATEGORY.
...................................(MLLW)......................

BERGEN POINT NY......758 PM........8.2-8.8............MODERATE.
